description.raw:
Add an example of loading SDFs using the file API:

`firefox examples/view_sdf_from_file.html`

![ambulancefromfile.gif](data/bitbucket.org/repo/r77Gja/images/2822974515-ambulancefromfile.gif)

---

Tested that the example works for:

* Models without meshes (e.g. double pendulum...)
* Models with OBJ meshes (e.g. ambulance, walkway_metal_straight, cloverleaf_interchange...)
* Models with DAE meshes (e.g. bowl...)

Doesn't work yet for:

* Models with ogre materials (e.g. cordless_drill)
* Models with STL meshes

--- 

* Refactored code that loads OBJ + MTL out of scene because the scene class is getting too large.
* Updated `gzscene_test` to exercise the OBJ file API
description.html:
Add an example of loading SDFs using the file API:

firefox examples/view_sdf_from_file.html

Tested that the example works for:

  • Models without meshes (e.g. double pendulum...)
  • Models with OBJ meshes (e.g. ambulance, walkway_metal_straight, cloverleaf_interchange...)
  • Models with DAE meshes (e.g. bowl...)

Doesn't work yet for:

  • Models with ogre materials (e.g. cordless_drill)
  • Models with STL meshes
  • Refactored code that loads OBJ + MTL out of scene because the scene class is getting too large.
  • Updated gzscene_test to exercise the OBJ file API

title.raw: Load OBJ from files (no HTTP request)
